1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Life is sometimes just about surviving. Choi Goon (Sung Joon), Jae Ho (Kim Chang Hwan), Jung Goon (Jung Young Ki) and Nok Yong (Lee Jae Won) are four friends who live together in a cramped basement apartment as they try to get by what they make doing petty jobs. Can they help each other to better times in their lives? "Swamp Ecology Report" is a part of the "KBS Drama Special 2012."

Can they help each other to better times in their lives? "_Swamp Ecology Report_ (qv)" is a part of the "KBS Drama Special 2012."
